titleStmt.title: A pleasant walk to heaven, through the new and living way, which the Lord Jesus consecrated for us, and his sacred Word reveals unto us. Published by Claudius Gilbert, B.D. minister of the Gospel at Limrick.
titleStmt.author: Gilbert, Claudius, d. 1696?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Titon, and are to be sold at the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street
